articles.title: Burial ground reveals Stone Age people wore clothing covered in elk teeth
articles.description: Elk teeth pendants may have been the jewelry of choice for at least one Stone Age group that lived 8,200 years ago.

articles.title: Opinion: Why LGBTQ Americans are seeing the sun again
articles.description: Under the Trump administration, many Americans, especially LGBTQ Americans, lost something precious: hope. And with the first actions of his administration, Allison Hope says President Joe Biden is setting a course to restore that hope.

articles.title: CNN reporter discusses whisper campaign to impeach Trump
articles.description: Former top Trump administration officials have been lobbying GOP lawmakers to try and convict Trump at his upcoming impeachment trial. CNN's Jamie Gangel reports.

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Wall Street can relax, moderates have the mandate
articles.description: Stocks have surged since Election Day and are near record highs. Wall Street is clearly a fan of President Joe Biden's new administration -- and it's largely because of growing hope that moderates in both parties will continue to call the shots.

articles.title: NFL surprises health care workers with Super Bowl tickets
articles.description: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell joined a web call with hospital workers to surprise them with tickets to Super Bowl LV.

articles.author: Amy Woodyatt, CNN
articles.title: Fossil-hunters think they have found the lair of a giant, predatory, prehistoric worm
articles.description: Scientists think they have discovered the undersea lair of a giant predatory worm that lived on the ocean floor some 20 million years ago and would pounce on unsuspecting marine creatures.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Ford is recalling 3 million vehicles for airbag problems
articles.description: Ford is recalling 3 million US and Canadian vehicles with airbags manufactured by the same company whose devices have been linked to at least 18 deaths in the United States.

articles.title: Here's why protesters say they're gathering in Portland

articles.title: Netflix, Disney+ and other streaming sites offer more diverse shows than cable, study finds
articles.description: Americans want more diversity on TV, and they're increasingly finding it on streaming platforms such as Netflix and Disney+ than on cable, according to a new Nielsen study.

articles.title: Moody's chief economist: $900 billion stimulus isn't enough
articles.description: Moody's Analytics Chief Economist Mark Zandi says the most recent stimulus helped stave off recession in early 2021, but that more is needed for the long term health of the economy.

articles.author: Niamh Kennedy and Sara Spary, CNN
articles.title: Loyal dog waits for six days outside hospital for her sick owner
articles.description: They say that a dog is a man's best friend -- and that saying rang true for one patient of a hospital in Trabzon, northeastern Turkey, whose loyal pet waited patiently outside the entrance for six days until he was discharged.

articles.title: Josh Hawley is definitely not sorry
articles.description: It's been two weeks since a violent mob -- egged on by ex-President Donald Trump and a complicit Republican Party -- stormed the US Capitol amid formal counting of the Electoral College vote to confirm Joe Biden had won the White House.

articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn, CNN Business
articles.title: Walmart will expand Covid-19 vaccinations to more states
articles.description: Walmart is rolling out the Covid-19 vaccine in more states as the Biden administration tries to accelerate distribution.
